DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy of pregabalin or pregabalin and continuous wound infusion versus placebo for analgesia following thoracotomy
DOC.brief_title: Perioperative Pregabalin and Continuous Wound Infusion for Pain Control Following Thoracotomy
DOC.criteria: patients scheduled for a thoracotomy, age >70 years BMI > 30 preoperative Hb < 10 mg/dL preexistent chronic pain neurologic disease chronic assumption of alcohol treatment with analgesics, anxiolytics, sedatives, antidepressants, or calcium channel inhibitors
